title: Clowning around
creator_credit: George Whaley, Paul D. Barron, Antonia Barnard and Barron Films
brief_description: The story of a boy with a special dream and a teacher with a painful past. Simon Gunner dreams of being a clown; not just an ordinary clown, but a clown in a circus. This story is filled with wonderful characters and colourful settings and stars Clayton Williamson, Noni Hazelhurst, Ernie Dingo and Jean-Michael Dagory in a family adventure
